TopicTitle: The X-32 or the 'Ultra nimble VTOL' to my Youtube subscribers

Articles.Content:
I finally made a thread for my best aircraft and the most popular on my channel, my subscribers only know the name 'Ultra nimble VTOL' but in-game it is called the X-32. It has rather impressive manoeuvrability and is based on the F-35 Lightning. Here are the videos from my channel that are about the plane (In the last video it has been slightly edited to make it look sleeker):

Here is the video of the one with missiles:

Downloads:

Unarmed:http://www./download/gzjehong1ciergv/X-32.craft

Armed (and painted):http://www./download/kyav3cdq07odkm0/X-32+armed.craft

Please post pictures of your paint jobs on this craft
Glad to see it on its own forum, well done.

I know, a few comments on the videos say that they like the craft so I thought that providing a download would be a good idea, it also helps if it disappears from the SPH as it will give me a chance to get it back.
Excellent dive bombing () in the last video, and who says kerbals can't be classified under ammo!
Haha, the missiles that were fired hit underneath the craft, that's why they did no damage, a direct hit would have ripped it apart.
